titleStmt.title: The way to heauen In a sermon deliuered at Saint Maries Spittle on Wednesday in Easter weeke the 27. of March. 1611. By Samuel Gardiner, Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Samuel, b. 1563 or 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: By W. W[hite] for Thomas Man,
